段: ﹙這篇無論大人、囡仔來看攏會明﹚。
(Chit phiN bo5-lun7 toa7-lang5, gin2-na2 lai5 khoaN3 long2 e7 beng5).

Bat有一擺ti7某所在，有一個女學學生kap伊一個小弟，兩個相chhoa7 出門；坐火車去到屏東 e5 所在chhoe7伊e5 窗友thit-tho5。Hit日in到屏東tu2-tu2 3點半，也hit個學生 e5窗友有來到車頭等接in；大家見面真歡喜，相kap講話；就chhoa7 in 到伊e5 厝。Hit暗就辦chhenn-chhau請 in。食飽了停tiap仔久，in就出去門口埕歇睏；有時坐--teh，有時起來；行來行去，講東講西講真久，是因為太久罕tit相tu2;又koh歇熱 e5 時間已經beh過，大家相chhoe7坐；險險就無thang 相探e5 機會，所以大家談話真濟；到真暗才無koh會；大家歡喜到極，攏總真心適。

Bat u7 chit8 pai2 ti7 bou2 sou2-chai7, u7 chit8 e5 Lu2-oh8 hak8-seng kap i chit8 e5 sio2-ti7, nng7 e5 sio-chhoa7 chhut-mng5; che7 hoe2-chhia khi3 kau3 Pin5-tong e5 sou2-chai7 chhoe7 i e5 chhong-iu2 thit-tho5. Hit jit8 in kau3 Pin5-tong tu2-tu2 3 tiam2 poaN3, ia7 hit e5 hak8-seng e5 chhong-iu2 u7 lai5 kau3 chhia-thau5 tan2-chih in; tai7-ke kiN3 bin7 chin hoaN-hi2, saN-kap kong2-oe7; chiu7 chhoa7 in kau3 i e5 chhu3. Hit am3 chiu7 pan7 chheN-chhau chhiaN2 in. Chiah8-pa2 liau2 theng5 tiap-a2-ku2, in chiu7 chhut khi3 mng5-khau2-tiaN5 hioh-khun3; u7-si5 che7--teh, u7-si5 khi2--lai5; kiaN5 lai5 kiaN5 khi3, kong2-tang kong2-sai kong2 chin ku2, si7 in-ui7 thai3 ku2 han2-tit sio-tu2; iu7-koh hioh-joah8 e5 si5-kan i2-keng beh koe3, tai7-ke saN-chhoe7 che7; hiam2-hiam2 chiu7 bo5 thang saN-tham3 e5 ki-hoe7, sou2-i2 tai7-ke tam5-oe7 chin che7; kau3 chin am3 chiah bo5 koh hoe7; tai7-ke hoaN-hi2 kau3-kek8, long2-chong2 chin sim-sek.

已經 9 點半lah，伊e5 窗友就是tiam3 ti7 屏東hit個，名叫玉枝；就ka7來chhoe7伊hit個同伴，名叫秀絨講︰「秀絨sang3,今咱來禮拜thang睏lah hoN3，你都kaN2真sian7 leh？」秀絨就講︰「Be7 koh8,我逐日心心念念，ai3來chhoe7你thit-tho5,今今仔日有好機會，我較講ma7 be7 sian7;是已經真暗lah，無lan2 kiam2 m7是ai3 koh講較久leh？」後--來秀絨kap in小弟名叫文雄，就kap玉枝以及 in家內 e5 人相kap做禮拜。In teh 禮拜，讀聖冊輪流讀，一人讀一節；秀絨 e5 小弟文雄也kap人輪來輪去。玉枝 e5 老母看見秀絨 e5 小弟iau2 hiah-nih8細漢liam5-piN hiah gau5讀聖經，想了真奇怪；到禮拜煞就叫伊來，問看伊幾歲，才知影是12 歲。

I2-keng 9 tiam2 poaN3 lah, i e5 chhong-iu2 chiu7-si7 tiam3 ti7 Pin5-tong hit e5, mia5 kio3 Giok8-ki; chiu7 ka7 lai5 chhoe7 i hit e5 tang5-phoaN7, mia5 kio3 Siu3-jiong5 kong2,“Siu3-jiong5 sang3, taN lan2 lai5 le2-pai3 thang khun3 lah hoN3, li2 to kaN2 chin sian7 leh?”Siu3-jiong5 chiu7 kong2,“Be7 koh8, goa2 tak8-jit8 sim-sim liam7-liam7, ai3 lai5 chhoe7 li2 thit-tho5, taN kin-a2-jit8 u7 ho2 ki-hoe7, goa2 khah kong2 ma7 be7 sian7; si7 i2-keng chin am3 lah, bo5 lan2 kiam2 m7 si7 ai3 koh kong2 khah ku2 leh?”Au7--lai5 Siu3-jiong5 kap in sio2-ti7 mia5 kio3 Bun5-hiong5, chiu7 kap Giok8-ki i2-kip8 in ke-lai7 e5 lang5 saN-kap cho3 le2-pai3. In teh le2-pai3, thak8 Seng3-chheh lun5-liu5 thak8, chit8 lang5 thak8 chit8 chat; Siu3-jiong5 e5 sio2-ti7 Bun5-hiong5 ia7 kap lang5 lun5 lai5 lun5 khi3. Giok8-ki e5 lau7-bu2 khoaN3-kiN3 Siu3-jiong5 e5 sio2-ti7 iau2 hiah-nih8 se3-han3 liam5-piN hiah gau5 thak8 Seng3-keng, siuN7 liau2 chin ki5-koai3; kau3 le2-pai3 soah chiu7 kio3 i lai5, mng7 khoaN3 i kui2 hoe3, chiah chai-iaN2 si7 12 hoe3.

文雄是某教會 e5 主日學學生，5 歲e5 時就學字母，7歲就會曉讀詩，10 歲e5 時就已經真gau5 讀聖經，真gau5吟詩；逐年e5 救主誕攏有提賞品，舊年有受賞一本金墘e5 新約聖冊；伊逐禮拜攏齊出席，所以才hiah快進步；今已經是高等科e5 學生lah；也chim2仔每禮拜m7但赴主日學，也有kap大人做伙禮拜；吟詩，聽道理，真歡喜；逐禮拜行遠路無嫌厭sian7,ai3 到上帝 e5 聖殿，謙卑承受教示，聽道理真趣味，心肝真感激，實在有hou7伊得著真大 e5 利益。玉枝 e5老母就tui3伊e5 阿姊講︰「你 e5 小弟實在真巧，真可取，攏是tui3你真gau5教示。」秀絨講︰「無影ah，比伊較會曉--e5 ma7是真濟leh﹗」玉枝 e5 老母就koh講︰「實在真gau5,an2-ni 都算是真感心lah﹗」後--來講煞，in大家就攏去睏。

Bun5-hiong5 si7 bou2 kau3-hoe7 e5 Chu2-jit8-oh8 hak8-seng, 5 hoe3 e5 si5 chiu7 oh8 ji7-bo2, 7 hoe3 chiu7 e7 hiau2 thak8 si, 10 hoe3 e5 si5 chiu7 i2-keng chin gau5 thak8 Seng3-keng, chin gau5 gim5-si; tak8-ni5 e5 Kiu3-chu2-tan3 long2 u7 theh8 siuN2-phin2, ku7-ni5 u7 siu7-siuN2 chit8 pun2 kim-kiN5 e5 Sin-iok Seng3-chheh; i tak8 le2-pai3 long2 chiau5 chhut-sek8, sou2-i2 chiah hiah khoai3 chin3-pou7; taN i2-keng si7 ko-teng2-kho e5 hak8-seng lah; ia7 chim2-a2 mui2 le2-pai3 m7-na7 hu3 Chu2-jit8-oh8, ia7 u7 kap toa7-lang5 cho3-hoe2 le2-pai3; gim5-si, thiaN to7-li2, chin hoaN-hi2; tak8 le2-pai3 kiaN5 hng7-lou7 bo5 hiam5 ia3-sian7, ai3 kau3 Siong7-te3 e5 seng3-tian7, khiam-pi seng5-siu7 ka3-si7, thiaN to7-li2 chin chhu3-bi7, sim-koaN chin kam2-kek, sit8-chai7 u7 hou7 i tit tioh8 chin toa7 e5 li7-ek. Giok8-ki e5 lau7-bo2 chiu7 tui3 i e5 a-che2 kong2, “Li2 e5 sio2-ti7 sit8-chai7 chin khiau2, chin kho2-chhu2, long2 si7 tui3 li2 chin gau5 ka3-si7.” Siu3-jiong5 kong2,“Bo5-iaN2 ah, pi2 I khah e7 hiau2--e5 ma7 si7 chin che7 leh!”Giok8-ki e5 lau7-bo2 chiu7 koh kong2,“Sit8-chai7 chin gau5, an2-ni to sng3 si7 chin kam2-sim lah!”Au7--lai5 kong2 soah, in tai7-ke chiu7 long2 khi3 khun3.

隔日就是拜三，in食早頓了；玉枝就chhoa7伊e5 窗友kap in小弟去看製糖會社，飛行機場hiah e5 明所。E7晡有歇睏，也 5 點半就食e5昏頓，因為熱天時，所以日頭iau2-boe7落山；到6 點in就相chhoa7 beh去公園散步；也in平常攏真ai3 談論聖經內 e5 故事，以及耶穌 e5教示；所以in tui3 公園出來 e5時，就直直行tui3 農場hit 方面去；四面有田園草木真sui2,也涼風微微仔來真chhio凊；in 那行就那談話，今將 in所談論 e5 記ti7 下底︰

Keh jit8 chiu7-si7 pai3-saN, in chiah8 cha2-tng3 liau2; Giok8-ki chiu7 chhoa7 i e5 chhong-iu2 kap in sio2-ti7 khi3 khoaN3 che3-thng5 hoe7-sia7, hui-heng5-ki-tiuN5 hiah e5 beng5-sou2. E7-pou u7 hioh-khun3, ia7 5 tiam2 poaN3 chiu7 chiah8 e5-hng-tng3, in-ui7 joah8-thiN-si5, sou2-i2 jit8-thau5 iau2-boe7 loh8-soaN; kau3 6 tiam2 in chiu7 sio-chhoa7 beh khi3 kong-hng5 san3-pou7; ia7 in peng5-siong5 long2 chin ai3 tam5-lun7 Seng3-keng lai7 e5 kou3-su7, i2-kip8 Ia5-sou e5 ka3-si7; sou2-i2 in tui3 kong-hng5 chhut--lai5 e5 si5, chiu7 tit8-tit8 kiaN5 tui3 long5-tiuN5 hit hong-bin7 khi3; si3-bin7 u7 chhan5-hng5 chhau2-bak8 chin sui2, ia7 liang5-hong bi5-bi5-a2 lai5 chin chhio-chhin3; in na2 kiaN5 chiu7 na2 tam5-oe7, taN chiong in sou2 tam5-lun7 e5 ki3 ti7 e7-te2:
玉枝︰「秀絨sang3,你看阮 e5 拜堂hiah大間hiah sui2 leh；咱tui3 chiah遠 e5 所在也iau2-ku2看會著，你看hit 個塔hiah懸leh；頂面有一支十字架，實在敢m7是真莊嚴 e5會堂mah？」

Giok8-ki,“Siu3-jiong5 sang3, li2 khoaN3 goan2 e5 pai3-tng5 hiah toa7 keng hiah sui2 leh; lan2 tui3 chiah hng7 e5 sou2-chai7 ia7 iau2-ku2 khoaN3 e7 tioh8, li2 khoaN3 hit e5 thah hiah koan5 leh; teng2-bin7 u7 chit8 ki Sip8-ji7-ke3, sit8-chai7 kiam2 m7 si7 chin chong-giam5 e5 hoe7-tng5 mah?”
秀絨︰「有影都著，實在起了真好看真sui2,無論甚物外位e5 人tui3 chia來，看了liam5-piN 會知hit間就是拜堂；會hou7 信主e5 人 e5 心真欣慕意愛，心心念念ai3入去看；也ti7 hia 吟詩、祈禱、感謝上帝，來享受無限e5 福氣。」

Siu3-jiong5,“U7-iaN2 to tioh8, sit8-chai7 khi2 liau2 chin ho2 khoaN3 chin sui2, bo5-lun7 sim2-mih8 goa7-ui7 e5 lang5 tui3 chia lai5, khoaN3 liau2 liam5-piN e7 chai hit keng chiu7-si7 pai3-tng5; e7 hou7 sin3 Chu2 e5 lang5 e5 sim chin him-bou7 i3-ai3, sim-sim liam7-liam7 ai3 jip8 khi3 khoaN3; ia7 ti7 hia gim5-si, ki5-to2, kam2-sia7 Siong7-te3, lai5 hiong2-siu7 bu5 han7 e5 hok-khi3.”
玉枝︰「你會記得咱ti7 女學。盧姑娘bat 講，in hit爿 e5拜堂起了真 chhoang3,真好看，kap別款 e5 厝攏有分別；hou7人tui3真遠 e5 所在攏看會著，也有大鐘黃昏暗e5 時若摃鐘，hit 個聲聽到真遠，hou7 人 e5 心肝開，意向tui3 hia去；你看阮e5 拜堂ma7是猶原有大鐘，若黃昏暗我出來散步聽了心肝做一下開；ai3 趕緊去赴祈禱會。」

Giok8-ki,“Li2 e7 ki3-tit lan2 ti7 Lu2-oh8. Lou5 Kou-niu5 bat kong2, in hit peng5 e5 pai3-tng5 khi2 liau2 chin chhoang3, chin ho2-khoaN3, kap pat8 khoan2 e5 chhu3 long2 u7 hun-piat8; hou7 lang5 tui3 chin hng7 e5 sou2-chai7 long2 khoaN3 e7 tioh8, ia7 u7 toa7-cheng hong5-hun-am3 e5 si5 na7 kong3-cheng, hit e5 siaN thiaN kau3 chin hng7, hou7 lang5 e5 sim-koaN khui, i3-hiong3 tui3 hia khi3; li2 khoaN3 goan2 e5 pai3-tng5 ma7 si7 iu5-goan5 u7 toa7-cheng, na7 hong5-hun-am3 goa2 chhut lai5 san3-pou7 thiaN liau2 sim-koaN cho3 chit8-e7 khui; ai3 koaN2-kin2 khi3 hu3 ki5-to2-hoe7.”
秀絨︰「咱ti7 女學beh暗e5 時，咱出去草埔行游，ma7有聽見神學校 e5 大鐘teh摃，khong、khong、khong…… 實在聽了hou7 人會改心悶；知影時間已經beh 到，就是hou7咱thang去上帝 e5 會堂，ti7 hia享受、祈求、感謝 e5 福氣。」

Siu3-jiong5,“Lan2 ti7 Lu2-oh8 beh am3 e5 si5, lan2 chhut khi3 chhau2-pou kiaN5-iu5, ma7 u7 thiaN-kiN3 Sin5 Hak8-hau7 e5 toa7-cheng teh kong3, khong, khong, khong...... sit8-chai7 thiaN liau2 hou7 lang5 e7 kai2 sim-bun7; chai-iaN2 si5-kan i2-keng beh kau3, chiu7-si7 hou7 lan2 thang khi3 Siong7-te3 e5 hoe7-tng5, ti7 hia hiong2-siu7, ki5-kiu5, kam2-sia7 e5 hok-khi3.”
玉枝︰「實在 hou7 咱e5 心真欣慕honn3；咱ti7 女學圖畫e5 時間，先生有提這張外國 e5尪仔圖，就是畫兩個尪仔某 ti7園--nih8 teh 做工；到beh 暗，忽然聽著到會 e5 大鐘teh摃，in二人就放工雙手合倚，頭殼chhih-chhih 向tui3教會堂hit 面teh祈禱honn3；實在咱teh 畫hit張圖e5 時， 咱e5 心kiam2 m7是真受感激mah？」

Giok8-ki,“Sit8-chai7 hou7 lan2 e5 sim chin him-bou7 honn3; lan2 ti7 Lu2-oh8 tou5-oe7 e5 si5-kan, sian-siN u7 theh8 chit tiuN goa7-kok e5 ang-a2-tou5, chiu7-si7 oe7 nng7 e5 ang-a2-bou2 ti7 hng5--nih8 teh cho3-kang; kau3 beh am3, hut-jian5 thiaN tioh8 kau3 hoe7 e5 toa7-cheng teh kong3, in nng7 lang5 chiu7 pang3-kang siang-chhiu2 hap8-oa2, thau5-khak chhih-chhih ng3 tui3 kau3-hoe7 tng5 hit bin7 teh ki5-to2 honn3; sit8-chai7 lan2 teh oe7 hit tiuN tou5 e5 si5, lan2 e5 sim kiam2 m7 si7 chin siu7 kam2-kek mah?”
秀絨︰「實在有影都著，hou7咱e5 心真欣慕，心心念念愛到上帝 e5 厝。」In teh講 e5 時忽然屏東教會 e5鐘teh摃，khong、khong、khong；玉枝，honn3︰「秀絨sang3,你有聽見無？」秀絨︰「Hou3--ah﹗真好聽 e5 聲有影，今仔日是拜三，所以咱著緊me2 倒轉來去赴祈禱會。」玉枝︰「今無咱趕緊轉來去koh。」

Siu3-jiong5,“Sit8-chai7 u7-iaN2 to tioh8, hou7 lan2 e5 sim chin him-bou7, sim-sim liam7-liam7 ai3 kau3 Siong7-te3 e5 chhu3.”In teh kong2 e5 si5 hut-jian5 Pin5-tong kau3-hoe7 e5 cheng teh kong3, khong, khong, khong; Giok8-ki, honn3,“Siu3-jiong5 sang3, li2 u7 thiaN-kiN3 bo5?”Siu3-jiong5,“Hou3--ah! Chin ho2-thiaN e5 siaN u7-iaN2, kin-a2-jit8 si7 pai3-saN, sou2-i2 lan2 tioh8 kin2-me2 to3-tng2 lai5-khi3 hu3 ki5-to2-hoe7.”Giok8-ki,“TaN bo5 lan2 koaN2-kin2 tng2--lai5-khi3 koh.”
所以in 就緊me2 倒去提聖詩、聖冊去赴屏東教會e5 祈禱會。In 2、3人hit 暗去赴祈禱會，實在hou7 in e5 心真歡喜；m7若窗友e5 厝大家相探，koh較要緊 in有真欣慕愛到上帝 e5 厝，kap 兄弟姊妹相交陪，那親像一家e5 人；實在 in e5 心真熱，到極歡喜 e5 款。

Sou2-i2 in chiu7 kin2-me2 to3 khi3 theh8 Seng3 si, Seng3-chheh khi3 hu3 Pin5-tong kau3-hoe7 e5 ki5-to2-hoe7. In nng7, saN lang5 hit am3 khi3 hu3 ki5-to2-hoe7, sit8-chai7 hou7 in e5 sim chin hoaN-hi2; m7-na7 chhong-iu2 e5 chhu3 tai7-ke saN-tham3, koh-khah iau3-kin2 in u7 chin him-bou7 ai3 kau3 Siong7-te3 e5 chhu3, kap hiaN-ti7 chi2-moe7 saN kau-poe5, na2 chhin-chhiuN7 chit8 ke e5 lang5; sit8-chai7 in e5 sim chin jiat8, kau3-kek8 hoaN-hi2 e5 khoan2.

到禮拜日 e5 時，玉枝有chhoa7伊e5 窗友kap in小弟去禮拜，in真早就去，是愛探看主日學e5 狀況甚物款；因為in兩人 ti7 女學e5 時逐禮拜攏有teh 幫贊主日學e5 工；歇睏轉去 in 厝 e5 時，也有鬥幫贊主日學；所以in tui3 細漢囡仔cham2然有趣味 e5 款。所以玉枝有chhoa7伊e5 窗友秀絨，去看屏東教會 e5主日學，也有將伊歇熱中teh教hit班hou7伊教；秀絨無推辭歡喜教，無各樣伊平常所teh教 e5 款，kap學生真好講話；也真gau5講故事hou7 in聽；所以hiah e5 學生到煞e5 時，ti7 邊仔大家teh 會講︰「這個先生tui3 ta2落來，he2真gau5講--ah，阮真愛聽；beh 會thang 逐禮拜來做阮 e5 先生kiam2 m7是真好。」

Kau3 le2-pai3-jit8 e5 si5, Giok8-ki u7 chhoa7 i e5 chhong-iu2 kap in sio2-ti7 khi3 le2-pai3, in chin cha2 chiu7 khi3, si7 ai3 tham3-khoaN3 Chu2-jit8-oh8 e5 chong7-hong2 sim2-mih8 khoan2; in-ui7 in nng7 lang5 ti7 Lu2-oh8 e5 si5 tak8 le2-pai3 long2 u7 teh pang-chan7 Chu2-jit8-oh8 e5 kang; hioh-khun3 tng2 khi3 in chhu3 e5 si5, ia7 u7 tau3 pang-chan7 Chu2-jit8-oh8; sou2-i2 in tui3 se3-han3 gin2-na2 cham2-jian5 u7 chhu3-bi7 e5 khoan2. Sou2-i2 Giok8-ki u7 chhoa7 i e5 chhong-iu2 Siu3-jiong5, khi3 khoaN3 Pin5-tong kau3-hoe7 e5 Chu2-jit8-oh8, ia7 u7 chiong i hioh-joah8 tiong teh ka3 hit pan hou7 i ka3; Siu3-jiong5 bo5 the-si5 hoaN-hi2 ka3, bo5 koh-iuN7 i peng5-siong5 sou2 teh ka3 e5 khoan2, kap hak8-seng chin ho2 kong2-oe7; ia7 chin gau5 kong2 kou3-su7 hou7 in thiaN; sou2-i2 hiah e5 hak8-seng kau3 soah e5 si5, ti7 piN-a2 tai7-ke teh hoe7 kong2,“Chit e5 sian-siN tui3 ta2-loh8 lai5, he2 chin gau5 kong2--ah, goan2 chin ai3 thiaN; beh oe7 thang tak8 le2-pai3 lai5 cho3 goan2 e5 sian-siN kiam2 m7 si7 chin ho2.”
後--來主日學煞，in就chhoa7去赴大人 e5 禮拜，hit日真歡喜，轉去那親像有be7講--tit e5 歡喜 kap 感激ti7 in e5心內 e5 款。隔早起就是拜一，秀絨 kap伊e5 小弟文雄就kap伊e5 窗友玉枝相辭倒去 in e5 本所在；向望 koh無偌久in beh koh ti7 女學來做伙，就an2-ni 大家暫時離別。

Au7--lai5 Chu2-jit8-oh8 soah, in chiu7 chhoa7 khi3 hu3 toa7-lang5 e5 le2-pai3, hit jit8 chin hoaN-hi2, tng2--khi3 na2 chhin-chhiuN7 u7 be7 kong2--tit e5 hoaN-hi2 kap kam2-kek ti7 in e5 sim-lai7 e5 khoan2.
